short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient method for accessing Google from DuckDuckGo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fan of DuckDuckGo, but occasionally find yourself in need of quickly accessing Google Search or Images? This extensions adds two new UI elements to the duck-bar, providing links to your current search in Google!
